issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Fix documentation errors for activity transition and its methods. 

[ERROR] ./Titanium/UI/Window.yml
Titanium.UI.Window: found 1 error(s)!
    methods
        addSharedElement
            parameters
                view
                    type
                        View

[ERROR] ./Titanium/UI/Window.yml
openWindowParams: found 8 error(s)!
    properties
        activityExitTransition
            constants
                Invalid constant: Titanium.UI.Android.TRANSITION_*
        activityEnterTransition
            constants
                Invalid constant: Titanium.UI.Android.TRANSITION_*
        activityReturnTransition
            constants
                Invalid constant: Titanium.UI.Android.TRANSITION_*
        activityReenterTransition
            constants
                Invalid constant: Titanium.UI.Android.TRANSITION_*
        activitySharedElementExitTransition
            constants
                Invalid constant: Titanium.UI.Android.TRANSITION_*
        activitySharedElementEnterTransition
            constants
                Invalid constant: Titanium.UI.Android.TRANSITION_*
        activitySharedElementReturnTransition
            constants
                Invalid constant: Titanium.UI.Android.TRANSITION_*
        activitySharedElementReenterTransition
            constants
                Invalid constant: Titanium.UI.Android.TRANSITION_*
fields.summary: Android fix documentation errors in activity transition.
